message: Title says it all! Yes, I'm up for it. Hopefully MikeDerk can join in as well. Will try to get hold of it. I've never seen it. I saw the first third a while back. Looked good.
I've heard that Ensemble movies don't fit the model very well. Can someone advise us if this movie could be a lost cause?
It would be very very challenging.  You're probably not looking at one storyform, but chunks of several different storyforms which may (or may not) intersect at the thematic levels.
